articles.author: Jack Luke
articles.title: Cheap smartwatch deals
articles.description: Up to 24% off  Garmin Forerunner 235, Fitbit Ionic, Fitbit Versa and Fitbit Charge 3 smartwatches in Amazon summer sale
articles.content:
Amazon has up to 24 percent off of a number of popular smartwatches from Fitbit and Garmin as part of its 2019 Summer sale.
GPS-connected smartwatches are a popular alternative to cycle computers if you dont need navigation functionality and are most interesâ€¦ [+1493 chars]
